name: Infestation (itch) (Fan22)
description:
You are a militar who was send to The City to stop with a bunch of other partners a recent and strange new Disease that infects and corrupts it´s owners, transforming them in living Horrors and horrible Monsters and Mutations.

!Go and recover the City from an unstoppable infestation and avoid becoming one of them.

//Controls

-Use A & D to Move

-Press W to Jump

-Press S to Crouch 

-Shoot whit Left Click

-Change guns whit Mouse whell

//Theme//

So the theme of the game jam was "a lot of.."   i tried to capture the theme by making a game about clearing a city with a LOT of infected mutants and monsters.

If you like the game and whant me to continue it, let me know :)
